The 12-470 black has a two row IDC header, no markings. on the 12-469 you c=
an pull the mute high
to function or low to un-mute "hence we removed the p=
in"  The 12-470 Black case I have tried every pin on the header
to both hig=
h or low state. Currently I'm building a header breakout so I can try to ef=
fect a change while the radio is running. Just slow going. However  if some=
body finds a simple snip let me know. 

I have turned my attentions to a in=
terface with the 12-469 to change the scan rate and add a random tuning mod=
e.
That's almost done! and I hope to post today or tomorrow.

-Sum
  ----- =

  From: bruce halliday

om

  steve and I got that sa=
me black one and could not do the modification we are electronically inept
=
  Steve wrote to Sum Duc and asked if he could figure out what pin to remov=
e but he answered he could not.
  I'm hoping you have better luck. let me k=
now
   
  bruce
